name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellant, v. James Russell MATTHEWS

judges: Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT and HUTCHINSON, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellant, v. James Russell MATTHEWS.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
Appeal, 273 Pa.Super. 374, 417 A.2d 696, dismissed as, having been improvidently granted.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Ernest D. Preate, Jr., Dist. Atty., Robert J. Farrell, Asst. Dist. Atty., for appellant.
casebody.head_matter:
445 A.2d 103
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellant, v. James Russell MATTHEWS.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Submitted April 19, 1982.
Decided May 19, 1982.
Ernest D. Preate, Jr., Dist. Atty., Robert J. Farrell, Asst. Dist. Atty., for appellant.
Daniel-Paul Alva, Philadelphia, for appellee.
Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT and HUTCHINSON, JJ.
